ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Black Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: Could one of you guys take the time please to explain how xp and charmed critters relates? I made level 12 today, and I was playing around with charm.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Could one of you guys take the time please to explain how xp and charmed
critters relates?
I made level 12 today, and I was playing around with charm. I noticed that
a lot of the time, I didn't get any xp when my pet's target died. What's
happening?

Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro.


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Her name is Pyzgin, and she spawns by the undead ruins (if you camp on the
> hill, she will spawn on the other side of the ruins). Unless something
has
> changed in the last couple of months, Putrid skellies are her place
holder, not
> Tovax. Also, she doesn't seem to spawn if you sit to close, so keep your
> distance. It takes about 2 hours of killing to get her to come.
>
> Good Luck
>
>
